text: That’s a good start? There are a few tens of pages in the manual, not sure how many.

elements.text: That’s a good start? There are a few tens of pages in the manual, not sure how many.

text:
It'll require multiple PRs.

For stdlibs that live inside the JuliaLang/julia repo, you could make a single PR that adds multiple tables of contents to all of those stdlibs.

For stdlibs that live in their own repos (Pkg, Statistics, Tar, Downloads, etc.), you'll need to make a separate PR to each stdlib repo.

elements.text: For stdlibs that live inside the JuliaLang/julia repo, you could make a single PR that adds multiple tables of contents to all of those stdlibs.
For stdlibs that live in their own repos (Pkg, Statistics, Tar, Downloads, etc.), you'll need to make a separate PR to each stdlib repo.
